sections.title: Project Summary
sections.description: A concise overview of the project.

questions.text: Provide a brief overview of the project and its goals.
What is the expected impact of this project?
What is innovative or unique about this project?

sections.title: Needs Statement
sections.description: Clearly articulate the problem the project addresses.

questions.text: Describe the problem the project aims to address.  Provide data to support the significance of this problem.
Who is the target population or beneficiary of this project?
What existing solutions are available to address this problem, and why are they insufficient?

sections.title: Project Description
sections.description: Detailed explanation of the project's activities and methodology.

questions.text: Describe the key activities and tasks involved in the project.
Provide a timeline for project implementation.
Describe the methodology or approach that will be used.
How will the success of the project be evaluated?
Provide a detailed budget breakdown, justifying each expense.
If applicable, describe any matching funds or in-kind contributions.
What specific metrics will be used to measure the project's success?
How will data be collected and analyzed?

sections.title: Sustainability Plan
sections.description: How the project will continue after funding ends.

questions.text: Describe how the project's benefits will be sustained beyond the grant period.
Provide a brief overview of your organization's mission and experience.
Describe your organization's capacity to implement this project.
